SELECT A.ACC_ID,TO_CHAR(A.ACC_CREATE_TIME ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') TIMEE, A.ACC_CA_NUMBER , D.DI_NAME ,A.ACC_REMARK,A.ACC_MONEY,A.ACC_MEMO ,A.ACC_TYPE FROM T_ACCOUNT A INNER JOIN T_DICT D ON A.ACC_TYPE = D.DI_CODE WHERE A.ACC_CA_NUMBER = #{cardNum} AND D.DI_TYPE = 'ACCOUNTTYPE'
AND A.ACC_CREATE_TIME >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND A.ACC_CREATE_TIME <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{overTime},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND A.ACC_TYPE = #{type}
ORDER BY A.ACC_CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT CA_BALANCE FROM T_CARD WHERE CA_NUMBER = #{cardNum}
